title: Venezuela Surge Leaves Slim Pickings in Emerging Distressed Debt
description: The ouster of Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro drove an outsize rally in the country’s bonds, making the already shrinking universe of deep-distress opportunities in emerging-market debt even smaller.
content: The ouster of Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro drove an outsize rally in the country’s bonds, making the already shrinking universe of deep-distress opportunities in emerging-market debt even smaller.
